Importing library

```{r}
library(forecast)
library(ggplot2)
library(tibble)
library(gridExtra)
```


Loading dataset 

```{r}
methane_train <- read.csv("./Data/Processed/methane_training.csv")
methane_test <- read.csv("./Data/Processed/methane_test.csv")
```

Creating time series

```{r}
methane_train_ts <- ts(methane_train$average, start = c(1983, 7), frequency = 12)
methane_test_ts  <- ts(methane_test$average,  start = c(2022, 1), frequency = 12)

#multi-seasonal 
methane_train_msts <- msts(methane_train$average, seasonal.periods = c(4, 12), start = c(1983, 7))
```

STL+ETS forecast

```{r}
stl_decomp <- stl(methane_train_ts, s.window = "periodic")
stl_ets_model <- forecast(stl_decomp, h = length(methane_test_ts))
```

TBATS forecast

```{r}
tbats_model <- tbats(methane_train_msts)
tbats_forecast <- forecast(tbats_model, h = length(methane_test_ts))
```
